item.title: Seeing God’s Family through the Overview Lens
item.description:
Seeing God’s Family through the Overview Lens by Sister Tamara W. Runia, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency given in Saturday Evening of 193rd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Sister Tamara W. Runia, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency

item.title: Your Repentance Doesn’t Burden Jesus Christ; It Brightens His Joy
item.description:
Your Repentance Doesn’t Burden Jesus Christ; It Brightens His Joy by Sister Tamara W. Runia, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency given in Sunday Morning of 195th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2025
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
